text.0: Pharmaceutical companies won’t distribute #COVID19 vaccines to lower-income countries without liability protection. To efficiently handle claims, the COVAX Facility could establish a procedure for compensating people who have a severe adverse event after immunization.
text.1: The authors analyze voters’ views on health care issues as represented in 19 national public opinion polls, including some as recent as October 2020. The implications of the 2020 election for the future of U.S. health policy are discussed.
text.2: In a phase 2 trial, outpatients with #COVID19 who received a single infusion of a 2800-mg dose of the neutralizing antibody LY-CoV555 had a greater reduction from baseline in viral load than those who received placebo.
